author: SuperCarlinBrothers
description:
Go to http://shopify.com/scb to sign up for your $1-per-month trial period.

Harry Potter and the 1000-Year War — a secret conflict that began with Godric Gryffindor and Salazar Slytherin and ended with Harry Potter and Lord Voldemort in the Great Hall of Hogwarts. Today, we’re diving deep into a massive Wizarding World theory that connects the Founders of Hogwarts, the Deathly Hallows, the Peverell Brothers, and the final duel of the series in a way you have NEVER heard before.

For years, fans have debated whether the Deathly Hallows were created by the Peverells… or given to them by Death. But what if the bigger twist is that the Peverells didn’t exist at all? What if Ignotus and Cadmus were never “brothers,” but secret identities used by Godric and Salazar themselves during a millennium-long magical feud?. 

#HarryPotter #SuperCarlinBrothers 

Written by: J & Ben Carlin
Edited by: Ethan Edghill

🎟️ Through the Griffin Door LIVE Tour — Southwest 2025
https://supercarlinbrothers.com
title: Harry Potter and the 1,000-Year War | Gryffindor vs Slytherin
